name: OIS-Bizcraft Checkout Gateway Plus
author: OIS-Bizcraft team

sections.description:
This is a OIS Bizcraft Checkout Payment Plus Gateway for WooCommerce.

With Integrated OIS Bizcraft Setup (Easy Setup), connecting to OIS Bizcraft is as simple as filling your OIS Bizcraft merchant info – no complicated API keys to cut and paste.

USER GUIDE
sections.changelog:
1.2.1

  • Update logo for responsive UI Theme

1.2.0

  • Callback response enhancement
  • New Timelines on order notes

1.1.6

  • Bug fixes

1.1.5

  • Change logo
  • Include billing email and billing firstname lastname for autofill on checkout page

1.1.3

  • Tested up to 6.0
  • new screenshoots

1.1.1

  • Add sandbox and live options
  • add Option Processing and Completed status

1.0.0

  • Update the api url to production url

0.4.0

  • Added cancelled status

0.3.0

  • Use wc_send_json instead of echo for api callback response

0.2.0

  • Use wc_send_json instead of echo for api callback response
  • Use WordPress HTTP API instead of CURL

0.1.0

  • Beta release
